testsuite.name: nsu.fit.qyoga.cases.app.external.AuthorizationTests

testcase.name: QYoga should prohibit access to restricted endpoint with broken token()
QYoga should prohibit access to restricted endpoint without auth header()
QYoga should prohibit access to restricted endpoint with edited token()
